Articles.Content: I have read that the devs have shelved/put on back burner a resource system to work on adding multi player mode saying because it is popular. Well, kathane mod is popular too and while an MP mode might be nice, I would much prefer they stick more to the original plan and put the resource system in first.

This is neither really feature request nor actual discussion of any development aspect. It's just an opinion. As such, I'll be closing this before someone decides to start a fire. This sort of thing got discussed to death in the few days after KerbalKon anyway.

/thread.
